message.name: ERR_TRAININGPROGRAM_XRV_AUTHORIZED_FROM_DATE_EARLIER_THAN_SERVICEOFFERINGTRAINING_START_DATE
message.locale: The Authorized From date, %1d, must be on or later than the service offering training Start Date, %2d.
The Authorised From date, %1d, must be on or later than the service offering training Start Date, %2d.

message.name: ERR_TRAININGPROGRAM_XRV_TO_BE_COMPLETED_BY_DATE_LATER_THAN_SERVICEOFFERINGTRAINING_END_DATE
message.locale: The To Be Completed By date, %1d, must be on or earlier than the service offering training End Date, %2d.

message.name: ERR_TRAININGPROGRAM_XRV_TO_BE_COMPLETED_BY_DATE_LATER_THAN_SERVICEOFFERINGTRAINING_END_DATE_OPEN_ENDED
message.locale: The To Be Completed By date, must be entered.

message.name: ERR_TRAININGPROGRAM_XRV_TRAININGPROGRAM_IS_NOT_OPEN_OR_APPROVED_CANNOT_BE_MODIFIED
message.locale: This training program is '%1c', it cannot be modified.

message.name: ERR_TRAININGPROGRAM_XRV_TRAININGPROGRAM_IS_COMPLETED_OR_WAIVED_CANNOT_BE_DELETED
message.locale: This training program is '%1c', it cannot be deleted.

message.name: ERR_TRAININGPROGRAM_FV_UNITAMOUNT_GR_OR_EQ_TO_ZERO
message.locale: The Unit Amount, '%1n', must be greater than or equal to zero.

message.name: ERR_TRAININGPROGRAM_FV_UNITSREQUIRED_GR_THAN_ZERO
message.locale: The Units Required, '%1n', must be greater than zero.

message.name: ERR_TRAININGPROGRAM_FV_UNITSREQUIRED_GR_THAN_ZERO_FOR_PROVIDERMEMBERS
message.locale: The Units Required must be greater than zero for the following provider member(s): %1s.

message.name: ERR_TRAININGPROGRAM_FV_UNITSREQUIRED_GR_THAN_ZERO_FOR_PROVIDERGROUPMEMBERS
message.locale: The Units Required must be greater than zero for the following provider group member(s): %1s.

message.name: ERR_TRAININGPROGRAM_XRV_AUTHORIZED_FROM_DATE_LATER_THAN_TO_BE_COMPLETED_BY_DATE
message.locale: The Authorized From date, %1d, must be earlier than To Be Completed By date, %2d.
The Authorised From date, %1d, must be earlier than To Be Completed By date, %2d.

message.name: ERR_TRAININGPROGRAM_FV_UNITSCOMPLETED_GR_THAN_ZERO
message.locale: The Units Completed, '%1n', must be greater than zero.

message.name: ERR_TRAININGPROGRAM_FV_UNITSCOMPLETED_INVALID
message.locale: The Units Completed entered is invalid.

message.name: ERR_TRAININGPROGRAM_FV_UNITSREQUIRED_INVALID
message.locale: The Units Required entered is invalid.

message.name: ERR_TRAININGPROGRAM_FV_DATECOMPLETED_INVALID
message.locale: The Date Completed entered is invalid.

message.name: ERR_TRAININGPROGRAM_FV_AUTHORIZEDFROMDATE_INVALID
message.locale: The Authorized From entered is invalid.
The Authorised From entered is invalid.

message.name: ERR_TRAININGPROGRAM_FV_TOBECOMPLETEDBY_INVALID
message.locale: To Be Completed By entered is invalid.

message.name: ERR_TRAININGPROGRAM_XRV_UNITSCOMPLETED_MANDATORY_IF_DATE_COMPLETED_IS_ENTERED
message.locale: Units Completed must be entered if Date Completed, %1d, is entered.

message.name: ERR_TRAININGPROGRAM_XRV_DATE_COMPLETED_LATER_THAN_CURRENT_BUSINESS_DATE
message.locale: The Date Completed, %1d, must be on or before the current business date.

message.name: ERR_TRAININGPROGRAM_FV_CREDITS_ACHIEVED_GR_THAN_ZERO
message.locale: The Credits Achieved must be greater than zero.

message.name: ERR_TRAININGPROGRAM_FV_CREDITS_ACHIEVED_INVALID
message.locale: Credits Achieved entered is invalid.

message.name: ERR_TRAININGPROGRAM_XRV_CREDITS_ACHIEVED_MANDATORY_IF_DATE_COMPLETED_IS_ENTERED
message.locale: The Credits Achieved must be entered if Date Completed, %1d, is entered.

message.name: ERR_TRAININGPROGRAM_FV_COMMENT_IS_TOO_LONG
message.locale: The value entered is too long (Actual length) - maximum allowed is '%1n'.

message.name: ERR_TRAININGPROGRAM_XRV_COMPLETION_VALUE_MANDATORY_IF_TRAININGPROGRAM_MANAGED_THROUGH_AGENCY
message.locale: The Completion value must be entered if the training program is managed through agency.

message.name: ERR_TRAININGPROGRAM_FV_PROVIDER_IS_CLOSED_TRAINING_CANNOT_BE_CREATED_FOR_PROVIDER_MEMBER
message.locale: The provider, %1s, is 'Closed', training cannot be created for provider member.

message.name: ERR_TRAININGPROGRAM_FV_PROVIDER_GROUP_IS_CLOSED_TRAINING_CANNOT_BE_CREATED_FOR_PROVIDER_GROUP_MEMBER
message.locale: The provider group, %1s, is 'Closed', training cannot be created for provider group member.

message.name: ERR_TRAININGPROGRAM_XRV_TRAINING_PROGRAM_WITH_STATUS_OPEN_OR_APPROVED_ALREADY_EXISTS_FOR_PROVIDER_MEMBER
message.locale: An '%1c' training program already exists for this provider member, %2s.

message.name: ERR_TRAININGPROGRAM_XRV_TRAINING_PROGRAM_WITH_STATUS_OPEN_OR_APPROVED_ALREADY_EXISTS_FOR_PROVIDER_MEMBERS
message.locale: An '%1c' training program already exists for training(s) and provider member(s): %2s.

message.name: ERR_TRAININGPROGRAM_XRV_TRAINING_PROGRAM_WITH_STATUS_OPEN_OR_APPROVED_ALREADY_EXISTS_FOR_PROVIDER_GROUP_MEMBERS
message.locale: An '%1c' training program already exists for training(s) and provider group member(s): %2s.

message.name: ERR_TRAININGPROGRAM_XRV_TRAINING_PROGRAM_WITH_STATUS_OPEN_OR_APPROVED_ALREADY_EXISTS_FOR_PERSON
message.locale: An '%1c' training program already exists for this person, %2s.

message.name: ERR_TRAININGPROGRAM_XRV_TRAINING_PROGRAM_WITH_STATUS_OPEN_OR_APPROVED_ALREADY_EXISTS_FOR_PROVIDER_GROUP_MEMBER
message.locale: An '%1c' training program already exists for this provider group member, %2s.

message.name: ERR_TRAININGPROGRAM_FV_PROVIDER_SERVICE_IS_NOT_APPROVED_TRAININGPROGRAM_CANNOT_BE_CREATED
message.locale: The provider service, %1s, is not 'Approved', the training program cannot be created.

message.name: ERR_TRAININGPROGRAM_FV_PROVIDER_DOES_NOT_PROVIDE_THE_SERVICE_FOR_TRAININGPROGRAM_START_AND_END_DATE_SPECIFIED
message.locale: The provider, %1s, does not provide this service, %2s, for the training program period specified, the training program cannot be created. The provider service period(s) are as follows: %3s.

message.name: ERR_TRAININGPROGRAM_FV_PROVIDER_DOES_NOT_PROVIDE_THE_SERVICE_FOR_TRAININGPROGRAM_START_AND_NO_END_DATE_SPECIFIED
message.locale: The provider, %1s, does not provide this service, %2s, for the training program period specified, the training program cannot be created. The provider service period(s) are as follows: %3s.

message.name: ERR_TRAININGPROGRAM_FV_PROVIDER_DOES_NOT_PROVIDE_THE_SERVICE_TRAININGPROGRAM_CANNOT_BE_CREATED
message.locale: The provider, %1s, does not provide this service, %2s, the training program cannot be created.

message.name: ERR_TRAININGPROGRAM_FV_WAIVER_EXPIRY_DATE_MUST_BE_ENTERED_IF_STATUS_IS_WAIVED
message.locale: The Waiver Expiry Date must be entered.

message.name: ERR_TRAININGPROGRAM_XRV_PROVIDER_IS_NOT_APPROVED_TRAININGPROGRAM_CANNOT_BE_CREATED
message.locale: The training provider, %1s, is not 'Approved', the training program cannot be created.

message.name: ERR_TRAININGPROGRAM_FV_REGISTERED_PROVIDER_OR_PROVIDER_DETAILS
message.locale: Either registered training provider or unregistered training provider must be entered.

message.name: ERR_TRAININGPROGRAM_FV_REGISTERED_TRAINING_OR_TRAINING_NAME
message.locale: Either registered training or unregistered training must be entered.

message.name: ERR_TRAININGPROGRAM_FV_PROVIDER_DETAILS_NOT_ENTERED
message.locale: 'Training Provider Details' must be entered.

message.name: ERR_TRAININGPROGRAM_FV_TRANING_NAME_NOT_ENTERED
message.locale: 'Training' must be entered.

message.name: ERR_TRAININGPROGRAM_XRV_TRAININGPROGRAM_IS_NOT_APPROVED_CANNOT_MARK_COMPLETE
message.locale: This training program for the member is '%1c', it cannot be modified.

message.name: INF_TRAININGPROGRAM_FV_UNITSCOMPLETED_NOT_EQUAL_TO_UNITSREQUIRED
message.locale: The Units Completed,%1n, are not equal to the Units Required,%2n, for the training program.

message.name: ERR_TRAININGPROGRAM_XRV_PROVIDER_MEMBER_UNITSCOMPLETED_MANDATORY_IF_DATE_COMPLETED_IS_ENTERED
message.locale: Units Completed must be entered if Date Completed is entered for the following member(s): %1s.

message.name: ERR_TRAININGPROGRAM_FV_PROVIDER_MEMBER_UNITSCOMPLETED_GR_THAN_ZERO
message.locale: The Units Completed must be greater than zero for the following member(s): %1s.

message.name: ERR_TRAININGPROGRAM_XRV_PROVIDER_MEMBER_DATE_COMPLETED_LATER_THAN_CURRENT_BUSINESS_DATE
message.locale: The Date Completed must be on or before the current business date for the following member(s): %1s.

message.name: ERR_TRAININGPROGRAM_FV_ATLEAST_ONE_PROVIDERMEMBER_MUST_BE_SELECTED_FOR_TRAINING_PROGRAM
message.locale: At least one provider member must be selected.

message.name: ERR_TRAININGPROGRAM_XFV_UNITAMOUNT_ENTERED_WHEN_NOT_MANAGED_THROUGH_AGENCY
message.locale: This training program is not managed through agency, Unit Amount cannot be entered.

message.name: ERR_TRAININGPROGRAM_XFV_AUTHORIZED_FROM_ENTERED_WHEN_NOT_MANAGED_THROUGH_AGENCY
message.locale: This training program is not managed through agency, Authorized From cannot be entered.
This training program is not managed through agency, Authorised From cannot be entered.

message.name: ERR_TRAININGPROGRAM_XFV_TO_BE_COMPLETED_BY_ENTERED_WHEN_NOT_MANAGED_THROUGH_AGENCY
message.locale: This training program is not managed through agency, To Be Completed By cannot be entered.

message.name: ERR_TRAININGPROGRAM_XFV_UNITSREQUIRED_ENTERED_WHEN_NOT_MANAGED_THROUGH_AGENCY
message.locale: This training program is not managed through agency, Units Required cannot be entered.

message.name: ERR_TRAININGPROGRAM_XFV_UNITAMOUNT_MODIFIED_WHEN_NOT_MANAGED_THROUGH_AGENCY
message.locale: This training program is not managed through agency, the Unit Amount cannot be modified.

message.name: ERR_TRAININGPROGRAM_XFV_AUTHORIZED_FROM_MODIFIED_WHEN_NOT_MANAGED_THROUGH_AGENCY
message.locale: This training program is not managed through agency, Authorized From cannot be modified.
This training program is not managed through agency, Authorised From cannot be modified.

message.name: ERR_TRAININGPROGRAM_XFV_TO_BE_COMPLETED_BY_WHEN_NOT_MANAGED_THROUGH_AGENCY
message.locale: This training program is not managed through agency, To Be Completed By cannot be modified.

message.name: ERR_TRAININGPROGRAM_XFV_UNITSREQUIRED_MODIFIED_WHEN_NOT_MANAGED_THROUGH_AGENCY
message.locale: This training program is not managed through agency, Units Required cannot be modified.

message.name: ERR_TRAININGPROGRAM_XRV_ALREADY_WAIVED
message.locale: The training program is already 'Waived', it cannot be waived.

message.name: ERR_TRAININGPROGRAM_XRV_TRAININGPROGRAM_IS_NOT_OPEN_OR_APPROVED_CANNOT_BE_WAIVED
message.locale: The training program is '%1c', it cannot be waived.

message.name: ERR_TRAININGPROGRAM_XRV_TRAININGPROGRAM_IS_NOT_OPEN_CANNOT_BE_APPROVED
message.locale: This training program is not 'Open', it cannot be approved.

message.name: ERR_TRAININGPROGRAM_XRV_TRAININGPROGRAM_IS_NOT_ACTIVE_CANNOT_BE_CANCELED
message.locale: This training program is already '%1c', it cannot be canceled.
This training program is already '%1c', it cannot be cancelled.

message.name: ERR_TRAININGPROGRAM_FV_ATLEAST_ONE_PROVIDERGROUPMEMBER_MUST_BE_SELECTED_FOR_TRAINING_PROGRAM
message.locale: At least one provider group member must be selected.

message.name: ERR_TRAININGPROGRAM_XRV_TRAININGPROGRAMMEMBER_IS_CANCELLED_CANNOT_BE_MODIFIED
message.locale: This member is '%1c', it cannot be modified.

message.name: ERR_TRAININGPROGRAM_XRV_WAIVER_EXPIRY_DATE_ON_OR_LATER_AUTHORIZED_FROM_DATE
message.locale: Waiver Expiry Date, %1d must be on or after the Authorized From date, %2d.
Waiver Expiry Date, %1d must be on or after the Authorised From date, %2d.

message.name: ERR_TRAININGPROGRAM_XRV_ATLEAST_ONE_TRAINING_SHOULD_BE_SELECTED
message.locale: At least one training must be selected to create a training program.

message.name: ERR_TRAININGPROGRAM_XRV_TWO_OR_MORE_TRAINING_REQUIREMENTS_REFER_TO_SAME_TRAINING_SERVICE_OFFERING
message.locale: Following training(s) have been selected more than once, they can be selected only once: %1s

message.name: ERR_TRAININGPROGRAM_XRV_LICENSE_CANNOT_BE_APPROVED
message.locale: The training requirements for this license type have not been 'Completed' or 'Waived' for some or all provider members.

message.name: ERR_TRAININGPROGRAM_FV_NO_PROVIDERMEMBERS_FOR_PROVIDER_TRAINING_PROGRAM_CANNOT_BE_CREATED
message.locale: No provider member currently recorded for Provider, new Training Program cannot be created.

message.name: ERR_TRAININGPROGRAM_FV_NO_PROVIDERGROUPMEMBERS_FOR_PROVIDER_GROUP_TRAINING_PROGRAM_CANNOT_BE_CREATED
message.locale: No provider group member currently recorded for Provider Group, new Training Program cannot be created.

message.name: ERR_TRAININGPROGRAM_FV_PROVIDERGROUPMEMBER_FROM_DATE_ADVANCE_TRAINING_PROGRAM_CANNOT_BE_CREATED
message.locale: The provider member %1s has from date in the future, new Training Program cannot be created.

message.name: ERR_TRAININGPROGRAM_XRV_PROVIDERGROUP_CLOSED
message.locale: The Provider Group is 'Closed', Training Program cannot be created.

message.name: ERR_TRAININGPROGRAM_FV_PROVIDERMEMBER_FROM_DATE_ON_OR_BEFORE_AUTHORIZED_DATE
message.locale: Authorized Date, %1d, should start on or after From Date, %2d, of %3s
Authorised Date, %1d, should start on or after From Date, %2d, of %3s

message.name: ERR_TRAININGPROGRAM_FV_PROVIDERMEMBER_TO_DATE_ON_OR_AFTER_TO_BE_COMPLETED_BY_DATE
message.locale: To be Completed By Date, %1d, should end on or before To Date, %2d, of %3s

message.name: ERR_TRAININGPROGRAM_FV_PROVIDERMEMBER_TO_DATE_ON_OR_AFTER_TO_BE_COMPLETED_BY_DATE_OPEN_ENDED
message.locale: To be Completed By Date, should end on or before To Date, %1d, of %2s

message.name: ERR_TRAININGPROGRAM_FV_AUTHORIZED_DATE_IS_MANDATORY
message.locale: 'Authorized Date' must be entered.
'Authorised Date' must be entered.

message.name: ERR_TRAININGPROGRAM_XRV_PROVIDERMEMBER_FROM_DATE_ON_OR_BEFORE_AUTHORIZED_DATE
message.locale: The From date, %1d, should be on or before the authorized date of the provider member training program, %2d.
The From date, %1d, should be on or before the authorised date of the provider member training program, %2d.

message.name: ERR_TRAININGPROGRAM_XRV_PROVIDERMEMBER_TO_DATE_ON_OR_AFTER_AUTHORIZED_DATE
message.locale: The To date, %1d, should be on or after the authorized date of the provider member training program, %2d.
